official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the purchase of certain strategic and critical materials for storage in the National Defense Stockpile under the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Administrator of General Services for the acquisition of silver, platinum, and nickel under the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the purchase of certain strategic and critical materials for storage in the National Defense Stockpile under the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act.
